pullrequest.title: Add Static Map Plugin for creating textured map model

content.raw:
Works well for me. I also placed some cars on the roads and the scale seems to be about right.

I was trying to load a very high latitude to test limits and ran into a problem/limitation which may be on Google's side. `-54.807864 -68.303979` shows up on google maps, but can't seem to be loaded with the API.
content.html:
Works well for me. I also placed some cars on the roads and the scale seems to be about right.

I was trying to load a very high latitude to test limits and ran into a problem/limitation which may be on Google's side. -54.807864 -68.303979 shows up on google maps, but can't seem to be loaded with the API.
